title: Solaris
summary: Solaris is a software-as-a-service platform that enables micro, small and medium-sized businesses to create their own no-code blockchain-based solutions. It allows businesses and individual product creators to tokenize, futurize and list unique products on a global marketplace, while embedding traceability and the creation process.

qa_pairs.question: What is Solaris?
qa_pairs.answer: Solaris is a software-as-a-service designed for micro, small and medium sized businesses to create their own no-code blockchain based solutions.

qa_pairs.question: What can businesses do with Solaris?
qa_pairs.answer: Businesses can tokenize, futurize and list unique pieces on a global marketplace, whilst embedding traceability and the creation process.

qa_pairs.question: What are the key features of Solaris?
qa_pairs.answer: Solaris provides no-code blockchain based solutions, tokenization, futurization, global marketplace, and traceability.

qa_pairs.question: What types of businesses can use Solaris?
qa_pairs.answer: Solaris is designed for micro, small and medium sized businesses.

qa_pairs.question: What are the main use cases of Solaris?
qa_pairs.answer: Solaris can be used by individual product creators and businesses to create their own no-code blockchain based solutions.

sections.heading: Solaris
sections.content: [Solaris](https://www.zengate.global/products/solaris-portal) is a software-as-a-service designed for micro, small and medium sized businesses to create their own no-code blockchain based solutions. For example, individual product creators and businesses making customer through Solaris can tokenize, futurize and list unique pieces on a global marketplace, whilst embedding traceability and the creation process.
